title: Anil Kumar Gupta - Quick Facts
text:
Anil Kumar Gupta
Department | Geology & Geophysics
Research Area(s) | National Mineral Award by the Ministry of Mines (2000) Prof. T.M. Harris Medal by the Birbal Sahni Institute of Palaeobotany, Lucknow (2004) Dr. J. Coggin Brown Memorial (Gold) Medal for Geological Sciences by the MGMI (2006)
